TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ReplicationConnection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 类表示一个复制连接。

span.span: The class represents a replication connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Active Directory 域服务，由 NTDS 连接的对象表示复制连接。In Active Directory Domain Services, a replication connection is represented by an NTDS-Connection object. 有关详细信息，请参阅"[NTDS 连接](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)"在 MSDN 库中的主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the "[NTDS-Connection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adschema/adschema/c_ntdsconnection.asp)" topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: Demand value:

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public ReplicationConnection (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context, string name, class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer sourceServer) cil managed
Public Sub New (context As DirectoryContext, name As String, sourceServer As DirectoryServer)

param.name: context
param.span: 一个 对象，它包含用来建立复制连接的目标和凭据。

span.span: A object that contains the target and credentials with which to establish a replication connection.
The user-defined name of the connection.

param.name: sourceServer
param.span: 一个 对象，它标识连接的源服务器。

span.span: A object that identifies the source server of the connection.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文、名称和源服务器初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified context, name, and source server.

exception.span: 对基础目录服务的调用导致了错误。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

Docs.exception:
以下任一原因均可导致此异常：This exception will occur for any one of the following reasons:
- 参数的目标不是域控制器或 AD LDS 实例。The target of the parameter is not a domain controller or AD LDS instance.
- 无效或为空字符串。 is invalid or an empty string.
- 参数中指定的目标与 参数中指定的服务器类型不匹配。The target specified in the parameter does not match the server type specified in the parameter. 服务器必须都是域控制器或 AD LDS 实例。The servers must both be either domain controllers or AD LDS instances.
- 和 参数中指定的服务器都是域控制器，但是不在相同的林中。The servers specified in the and parameters are domain controllers, but are not in the same forest.
- 在 和 参数中指定的服务器均为 AD LDS 实例，但它们不属于相同的配置集。The servers specified in the and parameters are AD LDS instances, but do not belong to the same configuration set.

span.span: or is .
The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
